title: Trash Day
description: Reminder that tomorrow is trash day! Be sure to put all of your trash bags on the curb tonight so that they get picked up tomorrow morning.

title: Heater
description: Reminder before you leave for the winter break to keep your heaters on at least 60 degrees to prevent frozen pipes!

title: Backyard
description: Reminder to clean up the backyard to prevent animals from picking at any trash that may be there.
